p: AChE inhibitory activities of the compound 14 were assayed by the spectrophotometric method. Compound 14 indicated anti-AChE activity with inhibition ratio at 35% in the concentration of 50 μM. Tacrine (Sigma, purity > 99%) was used as a positive control of inhibition ratio at 52.63% with the concentration of 0.333 μM [ 14].
